[{"id":"LR-182","entityId":"2-385","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Order daily | Tool-tip is shown in wrong place"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1568728096100"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"182"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. As eater order some dishes
  2. Move cursor over some dish in weekly order toolbar
    Note: tooltip appeared
  3. Scroll down the weekley order toolbar

Actual result: tool-tip moved to some weird place

Expected result: tool-tip disappeared

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1568728096100"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"7-63","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/image.png?file=7-63&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-181","entityId":"2-383","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Order page | Daily order receipt is shown for holiday"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1568727384824"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"181"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. As Eater order food on some day
  2. As Foodlord update weekly menu and set holiday for same day
  3. As Eater check order for this day again

Actual result: Holiday bear image is shown. Order is still shown in weekly order receipt

Expected result: Daily order is canceled so it's not shown in weekly order receipt

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1568727454788"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"7-62","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/image.png?file=7-62&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-180","entityId":"2-381","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Order page | Text section isn't scaled"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1568726431586"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"180"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. As Foodlord create daily menu with all possible dishes
  2. As Eater Open this daily menu

Actual result: Dish section isn't scaled to menu size. This happens when scrollbar is shown.

  1. Try to scroll down a menu

Actual result: scroll bar doesn't fit the menu section and text appeared from the bottom of container

expected result: text section is scaled to fit a menu size

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1568726602534"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"7-60","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/image.png?file=7-60&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"7-61","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=7-61&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-179","entityId":"2-379","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Weekly menu | Error is show in case of attempt to add dish"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1568725405363"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"179"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. As Foodlord go to Weekly menu creation page
  2. Select Some dish in drop-down
    Note: Do not click on Plus button
  3. Click on text field with previously selected dish
  4. Type non existing dish title
  5. Click on Plus button
    Note: "Щось пішло не так" error message is shown. 404 error is shown in console
  6. Select any dish from current drop-down
  7. Click on Plus button

Actual result: "Щось пішло не так" error message is shown.

Expected result: Dish is selected and added to daily menu

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1568726075042"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1568726065554"},{"name":"State","value":["Done"],"valueId":["Done"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[{"id":"4-2","author":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH","authorFullName":"Deleted User","issueId":"LR-179","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1568726075044,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-178","entityId":"2-377","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Weekly menu | Plus button is never grayed-out"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1568724829766"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"178"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. As Foodlord open weekly menu creation form
  2. Try to add all items from some section (i.e. garnishes)

Actual result: Plus button is enabled

Expected result: Plus button is disabled

Also Plus button is enabled even when no dish is selected

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1568724829766"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Improvement"],"valueId":["Improvement"],"color":{"bg":"#ffc8ea","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-140","entityId":"2-300","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Display message in case of weekly menu not published"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1566471202504"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"140"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user, I can see the message that informs that weekly menu on selected week hasn`t been published.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566901827701"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["1"],"valueId":["1"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-133","entityId":"2-288","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Disable days without menus in the calendar"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1566392274341"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"133"},{"name":"description","value":"

Days without a weekly menu should be disabled in the calendar

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566470982141"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-127","entityId":"2-274","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Notify user about menu being unpublished"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1566388938511"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"127"},{"name":"description","value":"

Users, whose orders might be affected by weekly menu changes should be notified about that.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1566388938511"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-26","entityId":"2-56","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Display counter for every dish on their cards on eater page"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1561378882441"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"26"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a User, I want to see a checkbox on a card of every dish and to be able to check/uncheck these checkboxes.

Acceptance criteria

  • Every card with a dish has a counter
  • Counter allows to increase/decrease the number in it
  • Counter is displayed as on a mockup
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1563973344410"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Desktop (4).png","id":"7-23","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/Desktop%20(4).png?file=7-23&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"eater","cssClass":"c10"}]}, {"id":"LR-32","entityId":"2-74","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show counter only on selected dish cards"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"admin"},{"name":"created","value":"1562164049319"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"32"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user, I can see counter only on selected dish cards

Acceptance criteria

  • Click on the dish card toggles the select state of the card
  • Counter is shown on selected cards only
  • Counter should be set to 1 in case user selects the dish card
  • Counter should be set to 0 in case user deselects the dish card
